text: Avaralli pratiyobbarannu navu avara papagaligagi dandisidevu. Avaralli kelavara mele navu kallina maleyannu surisidare, kelavaru bhikara birugalige tuttadaru. Matte kelavarannu navu bhumiyolage adumibittare, innu kelavarannu navu mulugisibittevu. Allahanu avara mele akrama esaguvavanagiralilla. Avaru tam'ma mele tave akramavesagikondaru
